programme.title: CAF U17 Africa Cup of Nations Morocco 2025 - Best Goals
programme.desc: Best goals of the 2025 U-17 Africa Cup of Nations that took place in Morocco with participation and great performance of three Arabic teams Egypt, Tunis and Morocco. The three Arabic teams qualified to the 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup in Qatar.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Olympique Lyonnais - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quater Finals 2nd Leg
programme.desc: This will be the first season whereby the UEFA Europa League will be played under a new format, which replaces the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. The new format also does not allow teams to transfer from the Champions League knockout stage to the Europa League knockout stage. The final will be played on 21 May 2025 at San Mames stadium in Bilbao, Spain.All matches are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Bastia vs Laval - Ligue 2 2024/2025
programme.desc: The 2024-25 Ligue 2 is the 44th season of the Ligue 2, the second-tier professional football league in France.18 teams competing in a round-robin format. The top three teams will be promoted to Ligue 1, while the teams finishing 17th and 18th will be relegated to National. AS Monaco, a team with a rich history and a strong fan base, is one of the top contenders to win the championship and earn promotion to the top division.

programme.title: Rapid vs Djurgården- UEFA Europa Conference League 2024/25 - Quarter Final 2nd Leg
programme.desc: The 2024–25 season will be the first UEFA Conference League played under a new format involving a 36-team league stage. The new format also does not allow teams to transfer from the Europa League to the Conference League knockout stage. The final will be played in Stadion Wrocław in Poland. All matches are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Lazio Bodø / vs Glimt - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quater Finals 2nd Leg
programme.desc: This will be the first season whereby the UEFA Europa League will be played under a new format, which replaces the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. The new format also does not allow teams to transfer from the Champions League knockout stage to the Europa League knockout stage. The final will be played on 21 May 2025 at San Mames stadium in Bilbao, Spain.All matches are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs Luciano Darderi (ITA) - Final - Grand Prix Hassan 2 - Marrakech 2025 - AT
programme.desc: Top seed [1] Tallon Griekspoor (NED) brings his big serve and aggressive baseline game to the Marrakech final, facing [7] Luciano Darderi (ITA), a rising clay-court talent known for his resilience and tactical play. Griekspoor targets his 3rd career ATP title and first of 2025, while Darderi looks to capture his 2nd title after triumphing in Cordoba 2024. A breakthrough moment awaits—who will lift the Marrakech crown?

programme.title: Jakub Mensik (CZE) vs Novak Djokovic (SRB) - Final - Miami Open 2025 - presented by Itaú - ATP 1000
programme.desc: 19-year-old Mensik, the Czech phenom, blasts into his first Masters final—taking down Top 10 giants with missile serves and fearless power. One win from history as youngest Miami champ ever.Across the net: Djokovic. The old lion prowls for his 7th Miami throne—still devouring dreamers.Tonight, fire meets fortress. The future charges at forever.

programme.title: Semi-Final 1 - ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 BMW Open in Munich makes its debut as an ATP 500 event, elevating its status on the professional tennis calendar. Held on the clay courts of MTTC Iphitos, the tournament features a 32-player singles draw and offers enhanced facilities, including a new 6,500-seat center court. This marks a significant step forward for one of Germany’s most historic and prestigious tennis events.

programme.title: EPL The Big Interview 2024/25 - Mikel Merino
programme.desc: It was the goal that made the footballing world stand up and take notice of Mikel Merino. In scoring the winner for Spain in the semi-finals of Euro 2024, his celebration paid homage to his father, who performed the same Iconic dance in the exact same stadium 33 years previously. This week on the Big Interview, Merino explains how his father has Inspired him, the influence hes taken from Basque culture, his surprise at finding out hed be playing as a striker at Arsenal and his thoughts on his first season in North London.

programme.title: EPL The Big Interview 2024/25 - Mikel Merino
programme.desc: It was the goal that made the footballing world stand up and take notice of Mikel Merino. In scoring the winner for Spain in the semi-finals of Euro 2024, his celebration paid homage to his father, who performed the same Iconic dance in the exact same stadium 33 years previously. This week on the Big Interview, Merino explains how his father has Inspired him, the influence hes taken from Basque culture, his surprise at finding out hed be playing as a striker at Arsenal and his thoughts on his first season in North London.

programme.title: ATP Masters 1000 Review 2025 - Monte Carlo
programme.desc: The Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters is a prestigious ATP Masters 1000 clay-court tournament held annually at the Monte Carlo Country Club in Roquebrune-Cap-Martin, France, near Monaco. Celebrating its 118th edition in 2025. As the first of three clay-court Masters 1000 tournaments each season, it attracts the worlds top tennis talent, offering valuable points and prize money. The tournament has seen legendary champions, with Rafael Nadal holding a record 11 titles.

programme.title: Moto GP 2025 Highlights - Qatar GP
programme.desc: The fabulous Lusail International Circuit lies on the outskirts of Doha, the capital city of Qatar. Built in little over a year, the track cost $58 million USD and required round-the-clock dedication from almost 1,000 workers in order to get it ready for the inaugural event - the Marlboro Grand Prix of Qatar on the 2nd October 2004.The track itself is a flowing layout of 5.4 kilometres, surrounded by artificial grass designed to prevent sand from the neighbouring desert from blowing onto the circuit. programme.title: Francisco CERUNDOLO (ARG) vs David GOFFIN (BEL) - Match 1 - ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 BMW Open in Munich makes its debut as an ATP 500 event, elevating its status on the professional tennis calendar. Held on the clay courts of MTTC Iphitos, the tournament features a 32-player singles draw and offers enhanced facilities, including a new 6,500-seat center court. This marks a significant step forward for one of Germany’s most historic and prestigious tennis events.

programme.title: Morocco vs Mali - Final CAF U17 Africa Cup of Nations Morocco 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 U-17 Africa Cup of Nations is the 15th edition of the biennial African youth football tournament organized by Confederation of African Football (CAF) for players aged 17 and below. Morocco was chosen as the host of this edition The top 10 teams will qualify for the 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup in Qatar as the CAF representatives. It is the first U-17 Africa Cup of Nations to feature 16 teams. Senegal are the defending champions.

programme.title: Tourcoing vs Poitiers - Marmara Spike ligue Volleyball 2024
programme.desc: The LNV Ligue A Masculine (LAM), currently known as the Marmara SpikeLigue for sponsorship reasons, is the top-tier mens volleyball league in France, established in 1938. Governed by the Ligue Nationale de Volley (LNV) under the French Volleyball Federation (FFVB), the league features Frances elite volleyball talent. Formerly called Pro A until 2009, it shares a rich history and prestige akin to its basketball counterpart.

programme.title: Semi-Final 1 - ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 BMW Open in Munich makes its debut as an ATP 500 event, elevating its status on the professional tennis calendar. Held on the clay courts of MTTC Iphitos, the tournament features a 32-player singles draw and offers enhanced facilities, including a new 6,500-seat center court. This marks a significant step forward for one of Germany’s most historic and prestigious tennis events.

programme.title: Main Race - Seville Marathon 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Zurich Maraton de Sevilla is set to celebrate its 40th anniversary on Sunday, February 23 in Seville, Spain. Renowned for its flat and fast course, the event has become a favorite among elite and amateur runners alike.

programme.title: Limoges vs Nantes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1.
